Class Main

public class Main
extends java.lang.Object
this is Main class. in this class we manage the programme and run it
Since:
2020-10-17

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void addRooms()
    if user choose sixth item (Adding room to hotel) we call this function add new room to the hotel get the features of the room
    static void checkIn()
    if user choose first item (check in) we call this function get the name of the guest and add it to list of guests in Hotel calss
    static void checkOut()
    if user choose fifth item (check out) we call this function when a guest want to leave the hotel must be checked out the guest remove from the list show the payment of the guest
    static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)  
    static void printMenu()
    print the menu of items
    static void reservation()
    if user choose second item (reservation) we call this function get all the information we want for reserving a room each guest should check in at first and then do the reservation
    static void showGuests()
    if user choose forth item (show guests list) we call this function print all guests are in the hotel
    static void showRooms()
    if user choose third item (show rooms list) we call this function print all rooms that we have in this hotel
